channel.title: Easy answer if you have windows media center on ur comp
channel.description:
Ok so if you have windows media center computer I need you do this for me :D
1. Click start. 2. Right click computer 3. Click properties 4. Click advanced 5. Click environment varibles 6. Find path double click it 7. Under the name path is all this stuff copy it and paste it in a post
What does this have to do with server and us helping you with it? It helps me compile so SMD :D

item.title: Easy answer if you have windows media center on ur comp
item.dc:creator: @Shadowspkin Shadowspkin
item.description:
@Shadowspkin wrote:

Ok so if you have windows media center computer I need you do this for me

  1. Click start.
  2. Right click computer
  3. Click properties
  4. Click advanced
  5. Click environment varibles
  6. Find path double click it
  7. Under the name path is all this stuff copy it and paste it in a post

What does this have to do with server and us helping you with it? It helps me compile so SMD

Read full topic
